sentences.en: a wolf pack
sentences.cn: 狼群

sentences.en: Have you finished packing yet?
sentences.cn: 你行李收拾完了吗？

sentences.en: He got a near perfect start, streaking away from the pack.
sentences.cn: 他的起跑近乎完美，迅速从那群人中蹿了出去。

sentences.en: He has a six-pack stomach and is extremely well-proportioned.
sentences.cn: 他腹肌发达，体型完美。

sentences.en: He picked up a six-pack of beer.
sentences.cn: 他拿起一箱6瓶装的啤酒。

sentences.en: He'd left me to pack up the mail and post it off.
sentences.cn: 他让我整理并投递邮件。

sentences.en: Hundreds of people packed into the mosque.
sentences.cn: 成百上千的人挤进了清真寺。

sentences.en: I forgot to pack my razor.
sentences.cn: 我忘记把剃须刀放入行李包了。

sentences.en: I have tried to pack a good deal into a few words.
sentences.cn: 我尽量言简意赅。

sentences.en: I was packed off to hospital for surgery.
sentences.cn: 我被匆匆送往医院手术。

sentences.en: It arrives as a flat pack and is bolted together on site.
sentences.cn: 送到时是一套盒装组合家具，再就地装配起来。

sentences.en: It shows a fox being disembowelled by a pack of hounds.
sentences.cn: 画面中一只狐狸正被一群猎狗撕咬得肠子外流。

sentences.en: John Major will not try to pack the House of Lords.
sentences.cn: 约翰·梅杰不会在上议院安插亲信。

sentences.en: Let's pack it in for the day.
sentences.cn: 今天就到着吧

sentences.en: Pack ice around Iceland was becoming a threat to navigation.
sentences.cn: 冰岛周围的浮冰群曾一度对船只航行构成威胁。

sentences.en: Pack it in. Stop being spiteful.
sentences.cn: 别闹了，不要恶意伤人。

sentences.en: pack out any garbage you have left.
sentences.cn: 把你们留下的垃圾都打包带走。

sentences.en: Pack the fruits and nuts into the jars and cover with brandy.
sentences.cn: 把水果和坚果放进罐子里，用白兰地酒浸泡。

sentences.en: Police arrived at his hotel and ordered him to pack his bags.
sentences.cn: 警察来到他的酒店，命令他收拾行李走人。

sentences.en: Prisons are having to pack in as many inmates as possible.
sentences.cn: 监狱只好拼命往里面塞犯人。

sentences.en: Rosie, although small, could pack a hefty punch.
sentences.cn: 罗西虽然个子小，出手却相当有劲。

sentences.en: Sal was the leader of the pack.
sentences.cn: 萨尔是这伙人的头儿。

sentences.en: Send away for your free information pack today.
sentences.cn: 今天就来函索取免费资料包吧。

sentences.en: The flat-pack units are by Gower kitchens.
sentences.cn: 这套平板家具是高尔厨房用具公司出品的。

sentences.en: the immersion heater has packed up.
sentences.cn: 浸没式加热器坏了。

words.tran_cn: 可捆扎的；可打包的；可压紧的
（常用来构成复合词）充满…的，塞满了…的
包，包裹；套装软件，[计] 程序包
包装机；包装工人；罐头食品工人，赶牲口运货的人
包装；把…装袋（package的过去式和过去分词）
[包装]包装；一群；背包；[临床]包裹；一副
挤；包装货物；[包装]被包装；群集

phrases.tran_cn: 一包；（野兽等的）一群；一盒
罩板包装（硬底上有凸起透明罩的物品包装）
冰袋；大片浮冰；[医]冰裹法
能巧妙（或有力）地打出一拳
n. （海上相互重叠的）浮冰块，积冰
不可靠的人，有敛癖的人
(英，非正式)（机器）停止转动；出故障
塞进；挤进；塞满了东西；某地方挤满了人
(非正式)叫某人卷铺盖，突然解雇某人

trans.tran_cn: 纸盒，全套东西，一捆…，背包，，一群，竞赛中落后者，一副，一队，填塞物
trans.tran_en: something wrapped in paper or packed in a box and then sent by post or taken somewhere

trans.tran_cn: 收拾行李，将…打包，保存，挤满，压实，佩枪，夹带
trans.tran_en: to go in large numbers into a space, or to make people or animals do this, until the space is too full
to put things into cases, bags etc ready for a trip somewhere
